data.author: Roni Jaakkola

changelog.release_notes:
Version 1.4 
- Trebble is now ready for Pebble Time 2!

Version 1.3 
- Trebble is now ready for Pebble 2!

Version 1.2
- Line information now also shows the destination stop/direction (Thanks Topias for suggestion!)
- Minor improvements for downloading the stop and line data

Version 1.1 
- Added vibration to indicate download completion 
- Fixed a bug where some stop names would not show in menu
Trebble is released! The version 1.0 includes finding the nearest bus stops in Tampere and the next departing lines from them. Stay tuned for new features and improvements!

data.description:
English

Trebble is an app for finding the next departing busses in Tampere, Finland. It uses GPS location to find your nearest stops and shows the next lines departing from those stops. If you have any feedback, suggestions or just want to say hi, drop me a message on Twitter @Nashtanir!

Finnish, suomi

Trebble näyttää seuraavat Tampereen pysäkkien lähtevät bussit. Se hyödyntää GPS-paikannusta löytääkseen lähimmät pysäkkisi sekä seuraavat niiltä lähtevät linjat ja lähtöajat. Jos sinulla on palautetta, ehdotuksia tai haluat vain muuten jutella, laita viestiä Twitterissä @Nashtanir!

--

Includes data owned by the city of Tampere:
JOLI, Tampereen joukkoliikenne,
http://joukkoliikenne.tampere.fi/

Logo and icons made by Freepik, downloaded from www.flaticon.com

latest_release.release_notes:
Version 1.4 
- Trebble is now ready for Pebble Time 2!
